snippet: A concert meant as a tribute to John Cage was paradoxically, perhaps, wholly devoted to music by Morton Feldman, a Cage associate who died in 1987.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews performance by Janacek Philharmonic Ostrava as part of the festival Cage at 100/Music at 2012 at Alice Tully Hall.
lead_paragraph: A concert meant as a tribute to John Cage was paradoxically, perhaps, wholly devoted to music by Morton Feldman, a Cage associate who died in 1987.

headline.seo: Janacek Philharmonic Ostrava Plays Morton Feldman
headline.main: Celebrating a Centenary With Works by a Friend
headline.print_headline: Celebrating A Centenary With Works By a Friend
